elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Discuss the program together using the following questions and record your thoughts in writing.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: We watched the following TV report:
choices: Zumba dream - shattered and danced out?
Revolution in the world of ice cream
A new start in cycling paradise
Darko and Moris look for the big picture

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Was a business plan drawn up or not? What were the main reasons for or against it?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Discuss the program together using the following questions and record your thoughts in writing.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What do you personally think of the company and its strategy? What do you see as promising? Where do you have reservations?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Briefly describe the company's market performance. What do you think of it?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How would you describe the market and the competition in which the company operates?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What do you think of the company's marketing? In your answer, give your opinion on each P (Product, Price, Place, Promotion) in one sentence.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Discuss the program together using the following questions and record your thoughts in writing.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What do you think of the company's management and organization? In your opinion, are the professional qualifications, networking and leadership quality of the management sufficient?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: In your opinion, are the opportunities and risks sufficiently analyzed by the company management? What did you find good? Which points are missing?

elements.name: question10
elements.title: How are the finances and financial planning? As a donor, would you be satisfied with the work of the management? Which points convince you? What would you like to know more about?

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Would you invest money in this company or even apply for a job with this company? Give reasons for your answer.
